attachments.fallback: [March 20th, 2020 10:00 AM] eliasmu: Are you considering audience segmentation? Not sure how to go about it but a thought that keeps crossing me: You would want to have a different message for the general public vs to a regular shop owner. A shop owner can get the virus from everyone that comes to their shop and give it to a lot more people through close contact and touching the commodity. I think a different targeted message will serve here.
attachments.text: Are you considering audience segmentation? Not sure how to go about it but a thought that keeps crossing me: You would want to have a different message for the general public vs to a regular shop owner. A shop owner can get the virus from everyone that comes to their shop and give it to a lot more people through close contact and touching the commodity. I think a different targeted message will serve here.

text: <@UVAL943JP> Audience segmentation is a must. This is just for overview facts, Once we get content, we will deliver to specific audience.
